title: Authors and Citation
text: Shen X (2021). laggedcor: Get lagged correlation two time-series data (wearable omics data.). R package version 0.0.1.
code: @Manual{,   title = {laggedcor: Get the lagged correlation between two time-series data (wearable and omics data.)},   author = {Xiaotao Shen},   year = {2021},   note = {R package version 0.0.1}, }

title: laggedcor
text: laggedcor collection R packages designed MS-based untargeted metabolomics data processing. packages share underlying design philosophy, grammar, data structures. laggedcor comprehensive computational framework MS-based untargeted metabolomics data processing analysis, including raw data processing (peak detecting), data cleaning (missing value processing, data normalization, integration), statistical analysis, metabolite annotation, biological function mining (pathway enrichment, feature-based metabolic module analysis).

title: laggedcor
text: can install laggedcor GitHub. can use laggedcor_install() install packages laggedcor.

title: laggedcor

Zhu* (Corresponding Author), Metabolic Reaction Network-based Recursive Metabolite Annotation Untargeted Metabolomics, Nature Communications, 2019, 10: 1516.Web Link. Thank much!
